title: Full list of every ESPYS 2025 Award winner
description: The 2025 ESPYS are underway. From Saquon Barkley to Caitlin Clark, find out which athletes won.
author: ESPN

title: Suni Lee, Shai Gilgeous-Alexander among best dressed on ESPYS red carpet
description: The stars shined on the red carpet before heading into the Dolby Theatre in Los Angeles for the 33rd annual ESPYS.
author: ESPN staff

title: Curry and Tuipulotu set to start for Lions in series opener
description: Tom Curry is set to win the competitive race to be the British and Irish Lions open-side flanker ahead of Jac Morgan, with Sione Tuipulotu featuring in an all-Scotland midfield.

title: The convicted ex-bike gang member playing at The Open
description: Former Australian motorcycle gang member and prisoner Ryan Peake speaks about his unlikely journey to the Open Championship at Royal Portrush.

title: Archer: Lord's win made injury rehab 'all worth it'
description: Jofra Archer says being part of a thrilling England win over India in his comeback game at Lord's made his long journey back to Test cricket "all worth it."

title: The Open notebook: McIlroy's major prep, Rahm's photobombing and more!
description: Sky Sports News' Jamie Weir pick out six storylines from the practice days ahead of The Open, including Rory McIlroy's prep for a home major win, Jon Rahm surprising fans in a Portrush bar and the players already making headlines at Royal Portrush...

title: Indiana Fever Star Makes History Against Liberty
description: The Indiana Fever have a reason to be happy.
